titlestmt.titleproper: Daniel M. Friedenberg letters and inventories, 1983
titlestmt.author: David Hill

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by David Hill using EADitor ©2011

change.item: Imported into EADitor. Some normalization has occurred to apply EAD 2002 schema validation and conform to EADitor basic requirements.

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Daniel M. Friedenberg letters and inventories
did.abstract: Letters and inventories relating to Fred Kormis plaques and medals.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Daniel M. Friedenberg was curator of coins and medals for the Jewish Museum in New York City.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Daniel M. Friedenberg letters and inventories, 1983, Archives, American Numismatic Society.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: Copyright restrictions may apply. Permission to publish or reproduce must be secured from the American Numismatic Society.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Contains two letters (1983) from Mark Jones, British Museum, Department of Coins and Medals, to Daniel M. Friedenberg concerning plaques and medals of Fred Kormis, and a copy of a reply letter (1983) by Friedenberg, accompanied by copies of two manuscripts: "Fred Kormis plaques, Daniel M. Friedenberg collection" and "Fred Kormis plaques, Jewish Museum collection."
